scripts.dev:cf: npm run build:cf && wrangler dev .output/server/index.mjs --assets .output/public --compatibility-flag nodejs_compat
scripts.deploy:cf: npm run build:cf && wrangler deploy .output/server/index.mjs --assets .output/public --name cors-proxy-nitro --keep-vars --compatibility-date 2026-02-10 --compatibility-flag nodejs_compat
